tool_description: Creates comprehensive shot lists based on client preferences, event type, and must-have moments for systematic coverage planning.

group_photos_needed.description: Whether formal group photos are required

detail_shots_priority.description: Priority level for detail shots (low, medium, high)

candid_shots_ratio.description: Percentage of candid vs posed shots (0-100)

error_messages: Empty must-have shots: Provide at least one must-have shot
Invalid detail shots priority: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid candid ratio: Candid shots ratio must be between 0 and 100
Invalid event type: Provide a valid event type
usage: Provide event_type, photography_style, must_have_shots array, and group_photos_needed. Optionally set detail_shots_priority and candid_shots_ratio.

shot_list_id.description: Unique identifier for the shot list

categorized_shots.description: Organized list of shots by category and priority

estimated_shot_count.description: Estimated total number of shots to be taken
